about.info: CMR Engineering College (CMREC) is an autonomous institution accredited with NAAC â€˜Aâ€™ Grade and affiliated with JNTU Hyderabad.
about.details: Established in 2010, CMREC is approved by AICTE and offers UG and PG programs in multiple disciplines.

location.info: Located at Kandlakoya (V), Medchal Road, Hyderabad â€“ 501401, Telangana, India.

fees.info: CMREC follows TSCHE guidelines for all programs.

placements.info: The Training & Placement Cell ensures 90%+ placements annually with top recruiters.
list: Top Recruiters: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, HCL, Amazon, Deloitte

facilities.info: CMREC provides world-class infrastructure for academics and activities.

rules.info: CMREC enforces a strict code of discipline, attendance, and academic conduct.

details.Dress Code: Formal attire from Monday to Friday. Casuals on Saturday only.
details.Behavior: Respectful conduct towards staff and peers is mandatory.
details.Ragging Policy: Ragging is strictly prohibited and punishable under law.

rules.note: âš–ï¸ Read our Code of Conduct: [https://cmrec.ac.in/](https://cmrec.ac.in/)

faculty.info: CMREC has highly qualified faculty from reputed universities and industries.
faculty.details: Our faculty emphasizes mentoring, research, and experiential learning.

events.info: CMREC organizes annual cultural and technical fests for students.

contact.info: For official queries, contact the administrative office.

timing.info: CMREC operates six days a week with a balanced schedule.
timing.note: Closed on Sundays and national holidays.

transport.info: CMREC provides transportation from major parts of Hyderabad including Secunderabad, Kukatpally, and LB Nagar.
